posts.content:
This build is a tribute to one of my favorite characters of all time, Geralt of Rivia.

I had to combine the merits of a Legendary Swordmaster (WM) with the supernatural talents of a Witcher (RDD) and Bard is the knot that ties them together and allows (UMD) the use of hand signs and dangerous alchemical potions.
